name: Concert Kings: Music Tycoon
summary: Tap and swipe to rake in the royalties in Concert Kings Idle Music Tycoon, a rock ‘n roll idle clicker! Become a pro band manager and build a sprawling music empire in this rockin’ tapper game. Collect music notes to earn riches, then spend ‘em on epic upgrades. You’ll even earn cash while you’re away! Buy a better stage, play bigger venues, recruit new talent, jam to original rock & pop music, and impress influencers on your journey to fame and fortune.
